Name: Complete Order Process for iPhone 15 Fine Woven Case
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select the iPhone 15 case, and proceed to buy. Fill out the order form, opt for marketing info, and continue to shipping verification.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button iPhone15FineWovenCase
Step 3: Click on label mobilePhoneModel (iPhone15)
Step 4: Click on label mobilePhoneModel (iPhone15ProMax)
Step 5: Click on button Buy
Step 6: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page 'form:/{fixed page}'
Step 7: Click on button Increase
Step 8: Click on div ProceedToCheckout
Step 9: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'form:/{fixed part}/{fixed page}'
Step 10: Click on input ReceiveMarketingInfo
Step 11: Click on input Email
Step 12: Click on main FormFixedPart
Step 13: Click on span EmailNewsOffers
Step 14: Click on input ReceiveMarketingInfo
Step 15: Click on input Email
Step 16: Enter input value in input Email
Step 17: Click on button ContinueToShipping
Step 18: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Purchase Process for iPhone 15 Plus
Description: Navigate to the home page, select the iPhone 15 Plus, and proceed to buy. Complete the order process and verify the checkout page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link iPhone15Plus -> Navigate to page 'display single item:/{fixed part}/{item id or slug}'
Step 3: Click on label itemAttributes (ItemStorage)
Step 4: Click on label itemAttributes (ItemColor)
Step 5: Click on button Buy
Step 6: Click on link PlaceOrder -> Navigate to page 'form:/{fixed page}'
Step 7: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'form:/{fixed part}/{fixed page}'
Step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
